div.p: How an extension context is interpreted.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/extension-context defines the following codes:

tr.td: The context is all elements matching a particular resource element path.
The context is all nodes matching a particular data type element path (root or repeating element) or all elements referencing a particular primitive data type (expressed as the datatype name).
The context is a particular extension from a particular profile, a uri that identifies the extension definition.

description.value: How an extension context is interpreted.

definition.value: The context is all elements matching a particular resource element path.
The context is all nodes matching a particular data type element path (root or repeating element) or all elements referencing a particular primitive data type (expressed as the datatype name).
The context is a particular extension from a particular profile, a uri that identifies the extension definition.
